"Off to the Ruins Together!":
"It's easy to think that a hunter can accomplish anything
alone, but that just isn't so. There is no more effective
class than a hunter for teaming up with others.
Especially if teaming with another hunter,
your attack type variation can be quite good.
Since your here, how about
doing some exploration in the Ruins with me?
*Clear on Very Hard or higher with an S rank
as a hunter traveling only with Oza"

"ハンターは単騎でも任務遂行可能と
思われがちだが、そうではないぞ。
他者との連携において、ハンターほど
効果的なクラスはないだろう。
特にハンター同士の連携においては
攻め方の多彩さがウリとなるぞ。
せっかくだ、オレと一緒に
遺跡探索で、実践してみないか？
※オーザのみ同行、
ハンターでベリーハード以上Ｓランククリア"
